  • Uses of Candidate in dao

    Methods in dao that return Candidate
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Candidate Dao_candidate.readCandidate​(java.lang.String id)
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to run SQL command in candidates table reading all candidates from the table that match the provided CANDIDATE_ID.
    Methods in dao that return types with arguments of type Candidate
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> Dao_candidate.loginCandidate​(java.lang.String login_sql)
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to iterate over candidates table checking for a USERNAME and PASSWORD from the respective columns that matches those provided in the arguments.
    java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> Dao_candidate.readAllCandidate()
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform SQL select statement reading all candidates from the candidates table.
    java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> Dao_candidate.readAllCandidateDesc()
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform SQL select statement reading all candidates in descending order from the candidates table.
    Methods in dao with parameters of type Candidate
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Dao_candidate.insertCandidate​(Candidate c)
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform insert SQL statement on candidates table.
    void Dao_candidate.updateCandidate​(Candidate c)
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform SQL update statement based on CANDIDATE_ID and Candidate instance with loaded attributes for DB update.
